definition: child emperor/(fig.) spoiled child/spoiled boy/pampered only child
lit. the sky is high and the emperor is far away (idiom)/fig. remote places are beyond the reach of the central government
eating comes first, then comes everything else (idiom) (Tw)
empress/refers to Tang empress Wuzetian 武則天|武则天 (624-705), reigned 690-705
one who does not fear the death of thousand cuts will dare to unhorse the emperor (proverb)/to a fearless person, no fence is high enough
pinyin: she3 de5 yi1 shen1 gua3 , gan3 ba3 huang2 di4 la1 xia4 ma3
containing_words.word: 舍得一身剐，敢把皇帝拉下马

definition: The Last Emperor, 1987 biopic of Pu Yi 溥儀|溥仪[Pu3 yi2] by Bernardo Bertolucci
lit. the emperor is not worried, but his eunuchs are (idiom)/fig. the observers are more anxious than the person involved
pinyin: huang2 di4 bu4 ji2 tai4 jian4 ji2

definition: see 皇帝不急太監急|皇帝不急太监急[huang2 di4 bu4 ji2 tai4 jian4 ji2]
pinyin: huang2 di4 bu4 ji2 ji2 si3 tai4 jian4

definition: lit. the emperor's daughter does not worry about whether she will be able to marry (idiom)/fig. highly sought after
pinyin: huang2 di4 nu:3 er2 bu4 chou2 jia4

definition: the mausoleum of the First Emperor near Xi'an

sentences.english: When you emperor of Manchoukuo, what rights did you have?
sentences.chinese: 你在当满洲国皇帝的期间，有什么权利吗？

sentences.english: The second emperor committed suicide; Zhao Gao eventually was killed.
sentences.chinese: 秦朝第二个皇帝自尽而死，赵高被杀。

sentences.english: His name was Charlemagne-Charles Magnus, the Great-emperor of the Romans.
sentences.chinese: 他就是神圣罗马帝国皇帝查理曼大帝。

sentences.english: Using the rope as a slide, Chien-Po helped the Emperor to safety.
sentences.chinese: 他们永绳索做了一个滑梯，把皇帝救到安全的地方。

sentences.english: The old minister paid great attention to everything, that he might be able to repeat it to the Emperor on his return.
sentences.chinese: 老大臣非常关注细节，以保回去之后可以对皇帝重述。

sentences.english: From the Yongle Emperor onwards, 13 Ming Dynasty Emperors were buried in this area.
sentences.chinese: 自永乐帝开始，明朝十三陵共埋葬了十三位皇帝。

sentences.english: Dragon robe is the emperor's court dress embroidered with dragon patterns.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝的朝服，上面绣着龙形图案。

sentences.english: The Emperor is endowed with civil and martial virtues.
sentences.chinese: 这个皇帝天赋文武双全。

sentences.english: The emperor abdicated in favor of his son.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝自愿退位，由他的儿子登基。

sentences.english: Yuan Shikai forced emperor to abdicate and hand over power to him.
sentences.chinese: 袁世凯逼迫皇帝逊位，把政权交给了他。

sentences.english: Did your husband get the Emperor's sword?
sentences.chinese: 那驸马得到皇帝的剑了么？

sentences.english: The man ran toward the emperor before falling unconscious to the ground, where he lay groaning.
sentences.chinese: 他径直向皇帝跑来，但终于不省人事跌倒了。

sentences.english: Beijing, the Ming and Qing emperors on the altar is the place on Festival.
sentences.chinese: 北京的月坛就是明清皇帝祭月的地方。

sentences.english: Shi Jingtang became emperor in this same year.
sentences.chinese: 施京唐成为皇帝在这同一年。

sentences.english: Qianlong was the emperor of Qing dynasty.
Chin Shihhuang, also named Yingzheng , is the founder of the Qin dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇，姓赢名政，是秦朝的开国皇帝。

definition: Taishang Huang/Retired Emperor/father of the reigning emperor/fig. puppet master
the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
Zhu Di, personal name of third Ming Emperor Yongle 永樂|永乐[Yong3 le4]
